body_html: Ahh, this is my screwup. For note to others, this error happens when you try to restore using the object ckpt = tf.train.get_checkpoint_state(model_dir) and not the ckpt.model_checkpoint_path. Thanks so much for looking at this girving! My apologies for not being more careful :(
body_text: Ahh, this is my screwup. For note to others, this error happens when you try to restore using the object ckpt = tf.train.get_checkpoint_state(model_dir) and not the ckpt.model_checkpoint_path. Thanks so much for looking at this girving! My apologies for not being more careful :(
body: Ahh, this is my screwup. For note to others, this error happens when you try to restore using the object `ckpt = tf.train.get_checkpoint_state(model_dir)` and not the ckpt.model_checkpoint_path. Thanks so much for looking at this girving! My apologies for not being more careful :(
